hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Be straight in the prostrations and none of you should put his forearms on the ground (in the prostration) like a dog

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَفْتَرِشُ ذِرَاعَيْهِ فِي السُّجُودِ
chapter.eng-name: One should not put the forearms on the ground during prostrations
